title: Found alot of bugs
body: So obviously this game is buggy and even more so in pre season, now i have come across alot of consistent bugs, should i leave them on a thread or what?

replies.body: there is a bug on azir where his tower's target beam will always stay on the enemy until it is destroyed or the turret has to target a new enemy

Yeah that one's been around a while. And the beam is a rather slim line, right?

Another bug that they "fixed" in a previous patch was the one where you go to a start a custom game and it says something like "processing" and doesn't stop. The only way to stop it was to hit the cancel button. After a recent patch, that bug is back.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Just be sure to read the guidelines for posting and check that noone else has posted x bug.
One is that control wards sometimes don't spot regular enemy wards (especially in side lane bushes!).
